data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Saharsa, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Saharsa, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Saharsa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 154 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Saharsa, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the church of Saharsa, Bihar, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Saharsa, Bihar, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput Banaudhia people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Saharsa, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Saharsa, Bihar, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Saharsa, Bihar, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
